name: Crystal Creatures
description:
"LIFE IS FRAGILE.
THATS SOMETHING YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND."

In Crystal Creatures you are an angel who has to understand the value of human life.

For this, your boss has given you a special mission, get an important object WITHOUT HURT ANYONE (or make them explode).

Being an angel in a world of humans will not be an easy task, but not impossible!

Controls:
-Arrow keys: Left and Right to move.
-Arrow key: Up to jump (press it on air for double jump).

[Made for the Mini Jam 119]
